quote: The filtered headshot that people have seen 100 times and a little bit of text is nowhere near as valuable as one piece of video.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the importance of video over static images for personal branding.
suggested_hook: Why your headshot isn't enough to stand out in real estate.

quote: Video gets shared more. Video more than photos, more than text content, is the most shared content on social media.
why_clipworthy: Emphasizes the power of video content in increasing reach and engagement.
suggested_hook: Want to increase your reach? Here's why video is your best bet.
